Top = 0 Left = 0 Height = 604 Width = 952 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "Form1" g_id = 0 g_name = 1 g_start = 2 g_end = 3 g_duration = 4 g_res_name = 5 g_plannedstart = 6 g_plannedend = 7 Name = "Form1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Load LOCAL ARRAY aNodeRecord(8) *Dim numberOfFields As Integer *XGantt = thisform.GanntGrid use D:\Develop\gannt\rv_ResursJrn.dbf IN 0 WITH This SELECT rv_ResursJrn SCAN aNodeRecord(.g_id ) = rv_ResursJrn.JrnUseId aNodeRecord(.g_name ) = rv_ResursJrn.TvrNm aNodeRecord(.g_start ) = rv_ResursJrn.UseStart aNodeRecord(.g_end ) = rv_ResursJrn.UseEnd aNodeRecord(.g_duration ) = rv_ResursJrn.UseMinute aNodeRecord(.g_res_name ) = rv_ResursJrn.ResursNm .ganntGrid.insertNodeRecord(aNodeRecord) *XGantt.InsertNodeRecord(aNodeRecord) ENDSCAN USE IN rv_ResursJrn .OptimizeTimeScaleStartEnd (3) ENDWITH
ENDPROC
